caption.p: Ordination (discriminant analysis of principal components) of the relative composition of defensive gland exudates [%] ( a), as well as the eleven morphometric characters [% relative to notogaster length] ( b) of mite individuals reared on the ten resources. The filled circles mark the group mean (centroid) of each respective group, ellipsoid hulls indicate the group dispersion (multivariate variance) as 95% confidential space. Percentages denote the variance explained by each axis. Colors correspond to the figure legend and Fig. 1
